t: NEW NO FADE FRESH SYSTEM LAUNCHES IN MASS RETAIL TO PREVENT HAIR COLOR FADE
s: No Fade Fresh is the latest indie brand venture from hair color pioneer Leland. He launched his career as a new product developmental consultant for a variety of the largest global hair color companies. He founded ARTec in 1989 and invented the first color depositing shampoos and conditioners.
